articles.author: Eric Berger
articles.title: Webb reveals a planetary nebula with phenomenal clarity, and it is spectacular - Ars Technica
articles.description: The colors show the star’s final breath transforming into the raw ingredients for new worlds.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google temporarily disabled YouTube's advanced captions without warning - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google says SRV3 was causing playback errors, so it has "temporarily" disabled them.
